products.name: Admin Tablet
products.description: Fully customizable admin tablet for your VRChat World completely modular for easy setup/modification. This is the only asset you will ever need for managing your world and events!

products.name: Alcohol System
products.description: Create custom drinks that get you and your friends drunk! Don't drink to much or you may need to puke!

products.name: Bouncer System
products.description: A panel that allows designated users to verify/unverify people.

products.name: Drinks Roullette
products.description: Powerful roulette game, to spice up your nights!

products.name: Floating Tags
products.description: Add floating images or text that follow players!

products.name: Room System
products.description: Create private rooms for your world with lots of utility and cosmetic options!

products.name: Security Keypad
products.description: Secure your world's systems with this customizable, easy to setup, and powerful keypad asset!

products.name: Avatar Enforcer
products.description: Easily manage which avatars are allowed in your world with this powerful avatar enforcer system!

products.name: Bonk Stick
products.description: Have fun bonking your friends with this interactive bonk stick!

products.name: Counter
products.description: A simple and customizable counter system for your VRChat world.

products.name: Launch Pads
products.description: Add launch pads to your world that can launch players in different directions with customizable force and effects!

products.name: Service Bell
products.description: A customizable service bell that players can ring to get attention of the staff.
